After being unloaded of the empty cubes, and an odd looking siphon,
Speedbreaker transforms, holding his laser pistol in his hand, "Thanks" he
says "let's get to busness, uh buisnisss, uh lets get some energon" he
finally finished. He then lowered a speacial goggle of one of his eyes. He
could emidiately see a large red pool far underneath the surface of the
earth. He lowerd his pistol and pulled the trigger. A blast erupted, and
tore into the earth, making a deep hole. Then as soon as the hole opened,
oil started to gush out. He held a cube over it, filling the cube into a
bright pink, from the clear color it was. He set it down and waited for
Dead-End to follow.
